    • com.huahan.hhbaseutils.activityanim中ActivityOptionsCompatICS的使用

      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static ActivityOptionsCompatICS ActivityOptionsCompatICS.makeCustomAnimation(Context context, int enterResId, int exitResId)
      Create an ActivityOptions specifying a custom animation to run when the activity is displayed.
      static ActivityOptionsCompatICS ActivityOptionsCompatICS.makeScaleUpAnimation(View source, int startX, int startY, int width, int height) 
      static ActivityOptionsCompatICS ActivityOptionsCompatICS.makeSceneTransitionAnimation(Activity activity, Pair<View,Integer>... sharedElements)
      这个方法必须放在view加载完后再执行，否则获取不到view的宽度和坐标
      static ActivityOptionsCompatICS ActivityOptionsCompatICS.makeSceneTransitionAnimation(Activity activity, View sharedElement, int sharedElementId)
      这个方法必须放在view加载完后再执行，否则获取不到view的宽度和坐标
